t: Amazon.com: John Boos Block Large Reversible Wood Chopping Board, CCB Series, 20"x15"x2.25", Maple: Cutting Boards: Home & Kitchen
s: I had a Boos Block cutting board that lasted for over ten years. When I had to replace it, I naturally went with the same brand. But this experience has been a disaster. The first board split right down the middle (not at the seams - the actual chunks of end grain wood split in half).
